mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auth_user (id, username, display_name, email, is_active, created_at) VALUES ( COALESCE(#{id, jdbcType=OTHER, typeHandler=com.bwbcomeon.evidence.typehandler.UUIDTypeHandler}, gen_random_uuid()), #{username}, #{displayName}, #{email}, COALESCE(#{isActive}, true), COALESCE(#{createdAt}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) )
